gemini_config.system_instruction: List ways I can recognize or involve sponsors in my project's community (e.g., special Discord roles, early feature access, private Q&A sessions).

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""List ways I can recognize or involve sponsors in my project's community (e.g., special Discord roles..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
